name: Deru
description:
You are entering the land of DERU.
As you begin your quest you will encounter creatures of untold fury. You will collect rare items and treasures. You will be joined by a mage and an archer. Seek out the five elemental temples and preform sacred blessings. Beware, if you preform them incorrectly you will have to battle the creatures of the Elements. Your quest is not and easy one, please save Deru!
